<table width='100%' border='5px' cellspacing='5px' cellpadding='5px'>
<tr id='r1'>
<td align='center' valign='middle'><a id='item1' href='#r0' onclick="toggle_visibility('tr1');">Promenante sur la strato, mi falis.</a>
<div id='tr1'><mark>Walking in the street, I fell.</mark></div></td>

<td align='center' valign='middle'><a id='item2' href='#r0' onclick="toggle_visibility('tr2');">Trovinte pomon, mi ĝin manĝis.</a>
<div id='tr2'><mark>Having found an apple, I ate it.</mark></div></td>

<td align='center' valign='middle'><a id='item3' href='#r0' onclick="toggle_visibility('tr3');">Li venis al mi tute ne atendite.</a>
<div id='tr3'><mark>He came to me quite unexpected.</mark></div></td>

<td align='center' valign='middle'><a id='item4' href='#r0' onclick="toggle_visibility('tr4');">Li iris tre meditante kaj tre malrapide.</a>
<div id='tr4'><mark>He went meditating (deeply) and very slowly.</mark></div></td>
</tr>
<tr id='r2'>

<td align='center' valign='middle'><a id='item5' href='#r1' onclick="toggle_visibility('tr5');">Ni hontis, ricevinte instruon de la knabo.</a>
<div id='tr5'><mark>We were ashamed, having received instruction from the boy.</mark></div></td>

<td align='center' valign='middle'><a id='item6' href='#r1' onclick="toggle_visibility('tr6');">La imperiestra servanto eliris, portante kun si la braceleton.</a>
<div id='tr6'><mark>The imperial servant went out, taking with him the bracelet.</mark></div></td>

<td align='center' valign='middle'><a id='item7' href='#r1' onclick="toggle_visibility('tr7');">Profunde salutante, li rakontis, ke oni kaptis la ŝteliston.</a>
<div id='tr7'><mark>Profoundly saluting, he related that the thief had been caught.</mark></div></td>

<td align='center' valign='middle'><a id='item8' href='#r1' onclick="toggle_visibility('tr8');">Ne dirante vorton, la dukino malfermis sian juvelujon.</a>
<div id='tr8'><mark>Without saying a word, the duchess opened her jewel-case.</mark></div></td>
</tr>
<tr id='r3'>

<td align='center' valign='middle'><a id='item9' href='#r2' onclick="toggle_visibility('tr9');">Laborinte unu jaron, kaj ŝparinte kelkajn dolarojn, mi edziĝis kun mia Mario.</a>
<div id='tr9'><mark>Having worked a year, and having saved a few dollars, I married (with) my Mary.</mark></div></td>

<td align='center' valign='middle'><a id='item10' href='#r2' onclick="toggle_visibility('tr10');">Transirinte la riveron, li trovis la ŝteliston.</a>
<div id='tr10'><mark>Having crossed the river, he found the thief.</mark></div></td>

<td align='center' valign='middle'><a id='item11' href='#r2' onclick="toggle_visibility('tr11');">Rigardinte okaze la plankon, ŝi vidis ian libron, forgesitan kredeble de elirinta veturanto.</a>
<div id='tr11'><mark>Looking (having looked) by chance on the floor, she saw some book, forgotten probably by a departed traveller.</mark></div></td>

</tr>
</table>
